title.rendered: WETSEAT SEAT COVERS  ( NEOPRENE / CANVAS / DURATEX) – Generic

content.rendered:
NEOPRENE

The Wetseat is Australia’s best neoprene seat cover since 2007. Specifically manufactured to suit the Australian way of life by the sand, sea, mud and dirt, the Wetseat is an innovative protection solution designed to fit like a second skin. It is easily cleaned and provides users with a cover that repels against spills.

  • Automotive Grade Premium Neoprene Rubber (Not Foam filled)
  • Designed & Tested to over 15 Global and Australia OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) standards
  • Tailor Made to each individual vehicle (Seats retain full functionality with covers fitted)
  • 2.5mm-2.7mm Thickness material
  • Highly Water Resistant
  • UV Stable
  • Abrasion and Chemically Resistant
  • Closed cell construction delivers superior seat cushioning
  • Sharkskin Embossing (Anti Slip backing)
  • Cold Machine Washable (Gentle Cycle)

CANVAS

The Tuffseat is the latest in canvas seat cover technology, made specifically for the Australian 4×4 and commercial vehicle market. The Tuffseat is engineered ‘Country Tuff,’ yet is without the rough feel experience with conventional canvas seat covers. It is specifically designed for superior fitting whilst also providing superior protection.

  • Tailor Made to each individual vehicle (Seats retain full functionality with covers fitted)
  • Constructed from AUSTRALIAN MADE canvas
  • Canvas is 14oz Impregnated Poly/Cotton
  • Canvas includes industry leading a Flame-Retardant coating
  • Designed and tested to over 20 Global and Australia OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) standards
  • 100% Waterproof
  • UV stable (won’t fade)
  • Tear and Mildew Resistant
  • Dimensionally Stable (won’t shrink or stretch)

DURATEX

Commonly known as denim our Wetseat Duratek covers have been specifically developed for the Australian 4×4 and commercial vehicle market. If you are looking a comfortable alternative to canvas but want the durability then the Wetseat Duratek cover is what you need, available in Black or Grey.

  • Tailor Made to each individual vehicle (Seats retain full functionality with covers fitted)
  • Constructed from AUSTRALIAN MADE Cotton-Twill
  • Includes PU Coating on the underside to keep it waterproof
  • Designed and tested to over 20 Global and Australia OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) standards
  • 100% Waterproof
  • UV stable (won’t fade)
  • Tear and Mildew Resistant
  • Dimensionally Stable (won’t shrink or stretch)

excerpt.rendered:
Manufactured from different materials for a wide range of vehicles.

Please request a quote for YOUR CAR.
Please let us know the specification of your car in the format

        Make    Model           		Body Type  Year   Version
e.g.    Toyota  Landcruiser 300	Wagen    	12/2021 	GX

… and the kind of cover you are after

e.g. Bundle, Front, 2nd Row, 3rd Row, …
